page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER IN BALFRON
page.content: When we went to the Police Station we found that 16 people work there, because it is the centre for the area. There is one cell for keeping prisoners in, which has to be used about twice a week. The{most common {crime}in the area is theft from cars. The Police have to answer on average about 30{emergency calls}each week. We asked whether much detective work was done or did they call in special detectives. The Sergeant told us they did both depending on the crime to be solved. The policemen patrol the area in police cars and are contacted by{radio}when they are needed. The Police come to our{school}every year to teach us about road safety and to tell us we must not go with strangers. We all think of the policemen as our friends.
